subject: Include your local telephone number.
body:
Since eBay auctions can be accessed from anywhere 
around the world, your publicity efforts aren't limited to local 
coverage.
It isn't always the financial benefits that are a 
primary motivator. In theory, your Webpage should look about the same whether your 
visitors use Macs or PCs.
So you pretend you're successful, and you do this 
by concentrating.
You never know when someone will see that number 
and call you immediately after reading your email full of useful 
information.
If so, you might be interested in being the first 
to find out what I'm working on next. You practice what you concentrate on. Test and 
track Append a tracking code to signature file.
